website_summaries.verdict: A handmade wood carrier using a water resistant waxed canvas.
pros: Easy to clean.Padded handles with a hook-and-loop closure that secures handles closed
Long handles allow you to sling carrier over the shoulder
Adjustable central strap secures wood logs
Customers would replace with same carrier
cons: Few complaints about this log carrier

customer_reviews.title: Love a crackling fire
customer_reviews.text: Living in the north east you can have some pretty cold weather at night our house happens to have a fireplace I love to burn wood at night this carrier makes it very easy for me to transport the logs a short distance back-and-forth into the house highly recommended if you have to carry wood, holding as many logs as you can handle!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thru my eyes!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great size....I can load it up with more wood than I can carry in my arms and then bring it all the way up the stairs and into my house! Two trips from the wood pile and I have enough for the night....instead of 4 or 5 trips with just my arms.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M

customer_reviews.title: Its ok. Made in china
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked to see the canvas material a bit heavier so i question the long term durability. So far it has held up ok but ive only used it a few times to haul wood into the house. Made in china
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Holds my wood
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing bad to say about this. I hope it lasts for a few years, but I just bought it, so....we will see. It is better than carrying them in your arms, as we have been doing for years.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Back saver
customer_reviews.text: We have a cabin on the river and we store the firewood below the house. This thing is a back saver. I can carry twice as much firewood up or down as I used to by hand with half the effort. Great tool.
customer_reviews.author: Fast Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love this, was looking to find a durable solution to take my firewood from outside to inside and to save getting splinters on my clothes and hands. This fits the bill perfectly and is great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: I like the way the handles wrap around the bag making ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the handles wrap around the bag making it sturdy. Quality product at a competitive cost. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Fodder

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and rugged.
customer_reviews.text: I Love It !!! My wood carrier is perfect. A real nice feature is the closing strap. It holds your wood more secure that it doesn't slip out. It's sturdy made. It's just a down right nice carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory E. Moul Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Looks very durable. Super heavy material and put together well. Haven't tried it yet since its summer but I'm sure will last for a very long time
customer_reviews.author: tracie113

customer_reviews.title: It can be closed so that the wood does not fall out.
customer_reviews.text: It can be closed so that the wood does not fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn J Archie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !!
customer_reviews.text: What an Amazing invention makes carrying Wood so much easier !!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Larosa

customer_reviews.title: Good Design
customer_reviews.text: it is easier to lug a load of firewood with the longer handle and the strap that secures the load. It is wide enough for the length of firewood that I cut 16-18" but a not enough width for 20-24" pieces. Good material and nice color
customer_reviews.author: John Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for hauling wood into the house from outside, very durable and not bulky. I have used this everyday since I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Jbird

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I moved three cords of wood. This bag was great!
customer_reviews.author: Janet E. Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and very handy log carrier. Makes a lot easier the process of carrying firewood into the house.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Ease
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier. Makes it so much easier to carry in wood.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Riesbeck

customer_reviews.title: Not as tough as they look
customer_reviews.text: I found that the canvas material has developed small tears/holes caused by sharp edges of split wood that was carried. Probably hauled about 25 loads before I noticed the tears. They look really nice, but the material won't last more than one season (carrying 4-6 cords). IT says "canvas" but I suspect that Levi denim would work out better. May update with a close up photo later. They function great, just surprised to see holes in such a short time. I purchased two different brands, both are developing holes.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to lift and carry
customer_reviews.text: Omg. I ordered this for camping - thinking with spring coming that would be the only use until fall. Haaaaa. This midwestern blizzard has made it essential already! The long handles makes it easy to lift and carry. It holds about 6 to 8 medium size logs. Less trips outside. And, when it has just snowed 30 inches over 2 days, the fewer trips the better! And... I now know I can't wait to bring it camping also!
customer_reviews.author: lizzie-b

customer_reviews.title: Wrap it up.
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for the limited amount of pre-cut firewood I keep for the pit and it's pretty sturdy. What I like best is that having done everything the hard way in the past, with these handles and this wrap, moving the firewood around is a snap. The color isn't bad either, just my style.
customer_reviews.author: PM Connors

customer_reviews.title: Looks perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived, so I cant comment on durability yet. It look perfect for my needs....carrying in firewood from my back yard. Nothing worse than trying to cradle the wood and getting my jacket messed up. I cant wait to try it!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Extremely functional!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. It makes bringing wood into the house sooooo much easier because you can carry a lot of it (and without getting your clothes dirty.)
customer_reviews.author: Teach

customer_reviews.title: Have Wood Will Travel
customer_reviews.text: Bringing wood in during the winter months can be quite a chore. After using this tote it makes restocking the wood bin much easier and less messy. The tote is rugged yet flexible and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: BobbyG

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful, especially with long enough handles to protect knuckles from sharp edges and a handy tightening strap to hold the bundle in place.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Holds all the logs you want to carry
customer_reviews.text: Well made. When open, it lies flat, and it has a security strap to hold the logs in if you're carrying them any distance.
customer_reviews.author: Upstate New York

customer_reviews.title: Product worked great!  THEN STRAP BROKE
customer_reviews.text: Would like seller to give me another one for another try?! Strap broke after several carries ??!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Foster

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Product is tough and durable. Easy to use, and holds plenty of wood.
customer_reviews.author: David livingston

product_meta.title: ForestWonder Firewood Carrier Log Carrier Wood Carrying Bag for Fireplace 16oz Waxed Canvas - Long Heavy Duty Handle and Security Strap
product_meta.description:
Waxed Canvas Log Wood Carrier By ForestWonder 

When it comes to keeping wood close at hand for your firewood rack cover, fireplace grate, wood stove, campfire or fire pit, we believe in convenience. That is where this large canvas log holder comes in.

Come discover where flexible wax coated canvas and heavy duty hauling straps have come together to provide sustainable durability and tangible resilience in a classic style.

This smart designed and well-constructed canvas tote log carrier will help you carry in more wood in fewer runs to the firewood rack outdoor with cover, and it is guaranteed to make your trip to the fireplace, log splitter, wood splitter or firewood storage rack fast and easy.

Manufactured with durable canvas material, strong-wide handles with a padded grip pad with velcro lock and a sophisticated special strap that allows you to tighten the logs while 
moving across the yard or through the house is the perfect answer to your indoor or outdoor fire-building .

This rummy wood transporter with open ends measures 39" L x 18" W. Excellent size for carrying a load of logs while keeping your clothes and floor clean.

The cloth wood carrier can be fold down for convenient compact storage. It is the perfect camping accessories
feature_bullets: ✔ This firewood log carrier is handmade using waxed canvas. Durable and easy to clean.
✔ Wood tote with handle that makes carrying heavy loads on the shoulder an easier task.
✔ Fireplace tools with Adjustable strap for securing the logs on your way to the fireplace grate.
✔ Portable and convenient size. The fire log carrier bag could be folded or hung by the straps.
✔ 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Refund, replacement or return available for the firewood carrier.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars67 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
